text: Minecraft is biggest game in the world.
There are 107 Minecraft achievements in the game.
The Hostile Mobs of Minecraft are the main antagonist.
There was originally plans for an epic Sky Dimension!
You can tell a wolf's health by their tail
The Endermen language is just English played backwards
The Ghasts are voiced by a cat!
The Enderman Language is actually English in reverse.
One Minecraft block equals 1 meter cubed. This makes a Minecraft world bigger than Jupiter!
Pumpkins are more rare than Diamonds.
Weather happens around every 7 Minecraft days, which is 2 hours real time.
